title: Elegant Family Villa in Prestigious Ursynów with Exceptional Features
description: Step into luxury with this stunning 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom detached house nestled in the prized Ursynów district. Spanning 235 square meters, the home seamlessly balances spacious comfort with sleek, modern finishes. Enjoy airy family living, a luminous gourmet kitchen, and inviting private suites—each space thoughtfully appointed for enjoyment and relaxation. Additional perks include dedicated storage, a large underground garage, energy-efficient systems, and custom built-ins for supreme convenience.
neighborhood_description: Set in Warsaw's beloved Ursynów, this prestigious address offers a serene ambiance with a coveted touch of historic charm and a short commute to the vibrant city center. Appreciate the neighborhood’s blend of greenery and elegance, complemented by top-rated schools, walkable parks, gourmet cafes, and boutique shopping. Truly a rare residential haven with refined city connectivity.
lifestyle_benefits: close proximity to green parks and leisure trails
ideal for elegant entertaining and family living
exceptional urban conveniences with historic charm
target_buyer: Discerning families or professionals seeking a refined home experience in Warsaw’s sought-after Ursynów—where luxury blends with everyday practicality and quick urban access.
market_positioning: Occupying a premium segment, this villa distinguishes itself with superb amenities, generous dimensions, and standout residential location. A unicorn among Warsaw listings, it offers unmatched comfort, energy efficiency, and exclusivity within tight market supply, setting a new standard for luxury family residences.
